author: olegk
msg: HTTPCLIENT-741: AbstractClientConnAdapter#abortConnection() no longer releases the wrapped connection back to the connection manager. The wrapped connection gets shut down, but remains attached to the adapter. The connection is expected to be released back to the connection manager by the request execution thread.
